name: justcode
description: Single-machine LeetCode clone with Java execution support

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist frontend/.vite temp backend/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo frontend/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.clean:modules: rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.clean:build: rimraf backend/dist frontend/dist frontend/.vite backend/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo frontend/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
